content.prompt: Which of the following features of Gustav Klimtâ€™s The Kiss is most strongly associated with Art Nouveau?

choices.label: The theme of love and sensuality
The use of bright, complementary colors
The application of multiple layers of glazes
The incorporation of organic patterns and decoration

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Explain how a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
